p.s: In the scene Chris is tries to be presented as the cool guy in school that has many friends and who most of the girls like.
He is also presented as very kind and lovely to Starr and a pacientpatient guy, who can also be funny.
As Starr said in an other scene she isn't on the level of Chris, but they still are matching very good together.
In the movie are many film-stylistic devices used, that undeline this theory about the personality of Chris.
At the very beginning of the given part of the movie, there is a scene in which Chris is walking through the school floor.
The whole scene is in slowmotionslow motion, so that there is a better focus on the movement of Chris.
Chris is walking in the middle of the school floor and also his arms are not laying beside his body, but are like 10 centimeters away from his body to create the effect that he looks bigger.
In the same scene, Chris is also shaking his hands with about 3-5 people and is greeting them.
That creates the impression that Chris is well-known in the school and has many loyal friends on his side.
The focus is not only on the way he is walking, but on his face, to give the watcher a first impression of Chris, who is seen by the watchers for the first time.
In the next scene, where Chris walks to Starr's locker, there are many important moments to get an impression about the relationship between Starr and Chris.
The beats that he makes for Starr and also his ability to make Starr laugh are very important in their relationship.

At many points in the whole movie, there are scenes, where Starr is unhappy and sad, where then Chris is commingcoming and makes Starr happy again with his beats, but mostly his jokes and funny dancing.
In this scene are the argument between Chris and Starr, therthere are used mostly eye-level shots to show that they are on the same level, which can also be applied on their relationship.
The director also used over-the-shoulder and reverse-angle shots, to show the facial impression of Starr and Chris, when they were talking.
This should make the scene more emocionelemotional, which is also underlined by the close ups used, when they were talking.
When Chris places the headphones on Starr's head, he did it really careful, so that it makes the impression, that he cares about Starr and is very lovely.

The dancing of Chris was also very important, because he wouldn't have danced in this scene, when Starr wouldn't be there so from that you can see, that Chris is willing to blame himself just to make Starr happy.
A big thing in their relationship are also the shoes.
In the beginning scene, where Chris was walking in slowmotionslow motion through the floor of the school.
In this scene was a close up on Chris' shoes, which were Jordans.
They share their love to Jordans, because Starr also wears Jordans and also has many pairs of them at home.
So this is a thing they share.
One big thing that they don't share is their skin colour.
This is a problem for some people in the school, for example the girls in the scene after this given scenscene, wichwhich are starring at Chris and Starr, when they were kissing.
The skin colour is also problematic in her family, but only with her father, her Mothermother and her siblings have no problems with the skin color of Chris.
So all in all one can say, that in this scene you can learn many things about Chris and his relationship to his girlfriend Starr.
